scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:msml@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:msml-dn@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Zabbix RS Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK [$var_contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:msml-dn@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Route: [$var_route] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Zabbix MSML Test Content-Length: 0

INFO [$var_contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:msml-dn@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 INFO Route: [$var_route] Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Zabbix MSML Test Content-Length: [len] Content-Type: application/vnd.radisys.msml+xml Content-Disposition: session; handling=required
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <msml version="1.1"> <dialogstart target="conn:[$7]" name="msml_healthcheck" src="file://../samples/ulaw/helloworld.vxml" type="application/vxml+xml"> </dialogstart> </msml>

BYE [$var_contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:msml-dn@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 3 BYE Route: [$var_route] Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Zabbix RS Test Content-Length: 0
